title: The other crisis.
text: Focusing on coronavirus is completely justified, but it isn't the only danger we face.
abstract: Focusing on coronavirus is completely justified, but it isn't the only danger we face.

similar.title: An uncommon cold.
text: The covid-19 virus isn't the first coronavirus to jump from animals to humans. What can we learn from previous encounters, asks Anthony King.
abstract: The covid-19 virus isn't the first coronavirus to jump from animals to humans. What can we learn from previous encounters, asks Anthony King.

similar.title: Deadly unknowns.
text: We are still scrambling to understand how dangerous the Wuhan coronavirus is.
abstract: We are still scrambling to understand how dangerous the Wuhan coronavirus is.
